name: Patrick CARPINO, Appellant, v. PRUDENTIAL PROPERTY AND CASUALTY INSURANCE COMPANY
name_abbreviation: Carpino v. Prudential Property & Casualty Insurance

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and McDERMOTT, JJ.
HUTCHINSON, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
LARSEN, J., files a dissenting opinion in which FLAHERTY, J., joins.
FLAHERTY, J., joins in this dissenting opinion.
parties: Patrick CARPINO, Appellant, v. PRUDENTIAL PROPERTY AND CASUALTY INSURANCE COMPANY.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order of the Superior Court affirmed. 298 Pa.Super. 629, 445 A.2d 195. See Davis v. Government Employees Ins. Co., 500 Pa. 84, 454 A.2d 973 (1982).
HUTCHINSON, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
LARSEN, J., files a dissenting opinion in which FLAHERTY, J., joins.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

opinions.text:
LARSEN, Justice,
dissenting.
For the reasons set forth in my dissenting opinion in Davis v. Government Employees Insurance Company, 500 Pa. 84, 454 A.2d 973 (1982), I dissent.
FLAHERTY, J., joins in this dissenting opinion.
opinions.author: LARSEN, Justice,

attorneys: M. Landon Spencer, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
454 A.2d 984
Patrick CARPINO, Appellant, v. PRUDENTIAL PROPERTY AND CASUALTY INSURANCE COMPANY.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 27, 1982.
Decided Dec. 30, 1982.
William Fedullo, Philadelphia, for appellant.
M. Landon Spencer, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and McDERMOTT, JJ.
